DOC.brief_summary: Each subject give tafamidis either high fat meal fast . After swallow tafamidis , tafamidis blood concentration measure periodically one week . After 14 day , subject take either different dose tafamidis dose opposite meal condition . Tafamidis concentration three different condition compare determine approximately .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing The Amounts Tafamidis In The Blood With Or Without Food
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female nonchild bear potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 total body weight 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Blood pressure screen visit great 140 mm Hg ( systolic ) 90 mg Hg ( diastolic ) . Use prescription nonprescription drug supplement within 7 day prior 7 day study .
